name: gentleness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being calm, kind, or soft: He was a man of kindness and extreme gentleness. Her motherly face seemed to radiate a simple gentleness and warmth.
the quality of not being violent, severe, or strong: He was overwhelmed by the gentleness of the air and the scent of flowers. He was content to be pushed along by the gentleness of the breeze.
the quality of not being steep or sudden: It is a well-used summer hiking area due to the gentleness of the terrain. I love the gentleness of the hills where these valleys nestle. See
gentle
